  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3385</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Virtual Reconstuction Model of Herodian Temple Mount.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Virtuelles Reconstuction Modell der Herodian 
Bügel-Montierung.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Modèle virtuel de Reconstuction de support de 
temple de Herodian.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Modelo virtual de Reconstuction da montagem do 
temple de Herodian.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Modello virtuale di Reconstuction del supporto del
tempiale di Herodian.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το εικονικό μοντέλο Reconstuction του ναού 
Herodian επικολλά.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Modelo virtual de Reconstuction del montaje del 
templo de Herodian.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The use of real-time visual simulation reconstructions such as the Herodian Temple Mount project is forging new opportunities for the exploration of ancient sites . This is a descriptionConstruction of the Herodian Temple Mount Real-Time Simulation Model</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Archeology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">temple mount</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Jerusalem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">model</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Gebrauch von Echtzeitsichtsimulation Rekonstruktionen 
wie dem Herodian Bügel-Montierung Projekt schmiedet neue 
Gelegenheiten für die Erforschung der alten Sites. Dieses ist 
ein descriptionConstruction des Herodian Bügel-Montierung 
Echtzeitsimulation Modells</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'utilisation des reconstructions visuelles en temps réel
de simulation telles que le projet de support de temple de Herodian 
forge de nouvelles occasions pour l'exploration des sites antiques. 
C'est un descriptionConstruction du modèle en temps réel de 
simulation de support de temple de Herodian</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O uso de reconstructions visuais real-time da simulação 
tais como o projeto da montagem do temple de Herodian está forjando 
oportunidades novas para a exploração de locais antigos. Este 
é um descriptionConstruction do modelo real-Time da simulação da 
montagem do temple de Herodian</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'uso delle ricostruzioni visive in tempo reale di 
simulazione quale il progetto del supporto del tempiale di Herodian 
sta forgiando le nuove occasioni per l'esplorazione dei luoghi 
antichi. Ciò è un descriptionConstruction del modello in tempo
reale di simulazione del supporto del tempiale di Herodian</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η χρήση των σε πραγματικό χρόνο οπτικών 
αναδημιουργιών προσομοίωσης όπως ο ναός Herodian επικολλά το 
πρόγραμμα σφυρηλατεί τις νέες ευκαιρίες για την εξερεύνηση των 
αρχαίων περιοχών. Αυτό είναι ένα descriptionConstruction
του ναού Herodian επικολλά το σε πραγματικό χρόνο μοντέλο 
προσομοίωσης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El uso de las reconstrucciones visuales en tiempo real de 
la simulación tales como el proyecto del montaje del templo de 
Herodian está forjando las nuevas oportunidades para la exploración 
de sitios antiguos. Esto es un descriptionConstruction del 
modelo en tiempo real de la simulación del montaje del templo de 
Herodian</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Archäologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bügelmontierung</string>
          </keyword>
